modName: Camilla Valerius - A Lovely Letter Marriage Fix
summary: Stops Sven and Faednal from fighting over Camilla if you marry her before completing the quest A Lovely Letter.
descriptionHtml:
[SIZE=5][U]Introduction[/U][/SIZE]
Something simple I whipped up when I discovered that I still got the quest to help Sven and Faednal fight over Camilla. Needless to say, I was a little weirded out by the prospect of running love letters from two different men back and forth between them and my wife, so I put an end to that.

This mod simply force-fails all objectives of the quest A Lovely Letter upon completion of The Bonds of Matrimony if Camilla Valerius is your spouse, it will not affect the state of the quest for any other potential spouse.

[SIZE=5][COLOR=Red][B]THIS MOD ALTERS THE VANILLA SCRIPTS, ALWAYS BACKUP YOUR SCRIPTS FOLDER![/B][/COLOR][/SIZE]

[SIZE=5][U]Install[/U][/SIZE]
[LIST]
[*]Use NMM (recommended).
[*]Unzip the contents of the archive to your Skyrim\'s Data directory.
[/LIST]

[SIZE=5][U]Uninstall[/U][/SIZE]
[LIST]
[*]Delete <SkyrimDir>/Data/LoveQuadrilateral.esp
[*]Restore the old <SkyrimDir>/Data/Scripts/QF_RelationshipMarriageCourti_00074793.pex file.
[*]Restore the old <SkyrimDir>/Data/Scripts/Source/QF_RelationshipMarriageCourti_00074793.psc file (if using the \'src\' version).
[/LIST]

[SIZE=5][U]Conflicts[/U][/SIZE]
Any mod that alters the quest The Bonds of Matrimony or it\'s scripts will conflict with this mod, other than it should be perfectly compatible with everything.
author: Jester335
